game.title: Game of Thrones
game.synopsis: Noble families in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros vie for control as they deal with ancient enemies, political intrigue, and supernatural threats.
game.beginning: The series begins with the execution of Robert Baratheon's rebellion against the Targaryen dynasty after the "Mad King" Aerys II Targaryen orders his guards to burn the entire city of King's Landing alive.
game.ending: The final episode sees Daenerys Targaryen, the last surviving member of House Targaryen and the Mother of Dragons, ascend to the Iron Throne as Queen of the Seven Kingdoms, though at a great cost.
